sentence.Network_en: He was a yellow gutless worm.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个胆小的、没勇气的可怜虫.

sentence.Network_en: By attacking me, by attacking my wife, he has proved himself to be a gutless coward.
sentence.Network_cn: 他攻击我，攻击我的妻子，这正证明他自己是个没出息的胆小鬼。

sentence.Network_en: [ Evelyn's Voice ] The whole industry's gotten gutless.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个出版业都已经没有勇气了.

list.abs: 2） 无病毒基因的病毒载体（gutless vectors）：这类载体的基因组中不含有任何病毒基因，仅含有病毒复制和包装所必需的顺式作用 …

entry.tran: 缺乏勇气的；没有胆量的；无毅力的；懦弱的
entry.def: If you describe someone as gutless, you think they have a weak character and lack courage or determination.

example.ex: By attacking me, by attacking my wife, he has proved himself to be a gutless coward.
example.tran: 他攻击我，攻击我的妻子，这正证明他自己是个没出息的胆小鬼。

auth_sentence.content: Go visit the frontier, you gutless wonders!
auth_sentence.res_content: Go visit the frontier, you gutless wonders!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Go visit the frontier, you gutless wonders!

auth_sentence.content: Our politicians are gutless and will not stand up for truth; to wit, the birthers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our politicians are gutless and will not stand up for truth; to wit, the birthers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our politicians are gutless and will not stand up for truth; to wit, the birthers.

auth_sentence.content: People may cry and deny, but the truth is the truth and we shouldn't be so gutless as to shy away from it.
auth_sentence.res_content: People may cry and deny, but the truth is the truth and we shouldn't be so gutless as to shy away from it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People may cry and deny, but the truth is the truth and we shouldn't be so gutless as to shy away from it.
